item.title: Hong Kong AirBnb Data Analysis
item.description: This report contains a detailed analysis of the AirBnb market across Hong Kong. We begin by conducting Exploratory Data Analysis and visualize some key findings from our dataset. Next, we visualize the distribution of AirBnB rentals across the city using Mapping. Subsequently, we try to come up with a Regression Model that predicts the average cost for a four night stay for 2 people in Hong Kong.
